text:
I had problems with localtime in another connection,
so I looked through the Apache code and found some of these
in ssl_engine_vars.c.
I suggest to replace localtime with localtime_r if the server is multithreaded,
like in apr/time/unix/time.c
creator: erich.prchal@siemens.at
jwoolley@apache.org
text:
I've fixed this by apr-izing the time functions in that file.  (It's better to use 
apr_time_exp_lt() than to proliferate localtime() vs. localtime_r() everywhere... that's 
the whole point of APR.)  Thanks for the report!
